meanings.definition: Not rhetorical; straightforward or direct in speech or writing.
meanings.sent1: Her unrhetorical explanation made it easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: The unrhetorical language in the book appealed to young readers.
meanings.sent3: His unrhetorical way of asking for help was refreshing.
meanings.sent4: The unrhetorical approach to problem-solving saved time.
meanings.sent5: The unrhetorical instructions were clear and concise.

meanings.definition: Not using or characterized by rhetorical devices or techniques.
meanings.sent1: The unrhetorical speech was plain and simple.
meanings.sent2: His unrhetorical writing style focused on facts rather than persuasion.
meanings.sent3: The unrhetorical presentation lacked any fancy language.
meanings.sent4: Her unrhetorical argument hit the nail on the head.
meanings.sent5: The unrhetorical advertisement was honest and effective.
